segments.text: I have a good feeling about this house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I liked it the first moment I pulled up to it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you like the outside , you are going to really love the inside .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ ll notice that the window treatments , carpeting , and drapes are all new .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like the way the blinds give you privacy from the street .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Follow me into the kitchen . You will love it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I love that they put a wine storage area in the kitchen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The best part is the bedroom and attached bathroom .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I love the relaxing colors in the tile and floor covering !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let ’ s take a few pictures so that we can remember what we like about this home .
segments.speaker: S2
